games.name: Super Mario Odyssey
games.author: Nintendo
games.description: Super Mario Odyssey is a 2017 platform game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch. An entry in the Super Mario series, it follows Mario and his new ally Cappy a sentient hat that allows Mario to control other characters and objects as they journey across various kingdoms to save Princess Peach from his nemesis Bowser's plans of forced marriage. In contrast to the linear gameplay of prior entries, the game returns to the primarily open-ended, 3D platform gameplay featured in Super Mario 64 and Super Mario Sunshine.

games.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.author: Nintendo
games.description: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild is a 2017 action-adventure game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch and Wii U consoles. The game is an installment of The Legend of Zelda series and is set at the end of its timeline. The player controls an amnesiac Link, who awakens from a hundred-year slumber, and attempts to regain his memories, save princess Zelda and prevent the further destruction of Hyrule by Calamity Ganon.

games.name: Super Mario 3D World
games.author: Nintendo
games.description: Super Mario 3D World is a 2013 platform game developed and published by Nintendo for the Wii U. It is the first main Mario platformer since Super Mario 3D Land for the Nintendo 3DS in 2011, and the first main Mario game since Super Mario Galaxy 2 for the Wii in 2010. It is the fifth installment in the Super Mario 3D series, following Super Mario 64, Super Mario Sunshine, Super Mario Galaxy, and Super Mario Galaxy 2. It is also the first main Mario game to be released on a home console since Super Mario Galaxy 2 in 2010.

games.name: Super Mario Maker 2
games.author: Nintendo
games.description: Super Mario Maker 2 is a 2019 side-scrolling platform video game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch. It is the sequel to the 2015 game Super Mario Maker and the second installment in the Super Mario Maker series. The game was released worldwide on June 28, 2019.

games.name: Metroid Dread
games.author: Nintendo
games.description: Metroid Dread is a 2021 action-adventure game developed by MercurySteam and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch. It is the first Metroid game to be released on a home console since Metroid Prime 3: Corruption in 2007, and the first Metroid game to be released on a Nintendo home console since Metroid: Samus Returns in 2017. It is the twelfth installment in the Metroid series, and the first to be developed by MercurySteam.

games.name: New Pokemon Snap
games.author: Nintendo
games.description: New Pokémon Snap is a 2021 action-adventure game developed by Bandai Namco Studios and published by The Pokémon Company for the Nintendo Switch. It is a sequel to the 1999 Nintendo 64 game Pokémon Snap, and is the first mainline Pokémon game to be released on a home console since Pokémon Let's Go, Pikachu! and Let's Go, Eevee! in 2018.

games.name: Pokemon brilliant diamond
games.author: Nintendo
games.description: Pokémon Brilliant Diamond and Shining Pearl are 2021 role-playing video games developed by Game Freak and published by The Pokémon Company for the Nintendo Switch. They are remakes of the 2006 Nintendo DS games Pokémon Diamond and Pearl, respectively, and are the first mainline Pokémon games to be released on a home console since Pokémon Let's Go, Pikachu! and Let's Go, Eevee! in 2018.

games.name: Pokemon Legends Arceus
games.author: Nintendo
games.description: Pokémon Legends: Arceus is a 2022 role-playing video game developed by Game Freak and published by The Pokémon Company for the Nintendo Switch. It is the first mainline Pokémon game to be released on a home console since Pokémon Let's Go, Pikachu! and Let's Go, Eevee! in 2018.

games.name: Super smash bros ultimate
games.author: Nintendo
games.description: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate is a 2018 crossover fighting game developed by Bandai Namco Studios and Sora Ltd. and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch. It is the fifth installment in the Super Smash Bros. series, succeeding Super Smash Bros. for Nintendo 3DS and Wii U. It was released worldwide on December 7, 2018.

games.name: Kirby and the forgotten land
games.author: Nintendo
games.description: Kirby and the Forgotten Land is a 2022 action-adventure game developed by HAL Laboratory and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch. It is the first Kirby game to be released on a home console since Kirby's Epic Yarn in 2010, and the first Kirby game to be released on a Nintendo home console since Kirby's Return to Dream Land in 2011.

games.name: Kingdom hearts 3
games.author: Square Enix
games.description: Kingdom Hearts III is a 2019 action role-playing game developed and published by Square Enix for the PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. It is the twelfth installment in the Kingdom Hearts series, and the sequel to Kingdom Hearts II. The game was released worldwide on January 29, 2019.

games.name: Final fantasy 7 remake
games.author: Square Enix
games.description: Final Fantasy VII Remake is a 2020 action role-playing game developed and published by Square Enix for the PlayStation 4. It is a remake of the 1997 PlayStation game Final Fantasy VII, and the first in a planned series of games remaking the original Final Fantasy VII. The game was released worldwide on April 10, 2020.

games.name: Halo the master chief collection
games.author: 343 Industries
games.description: Halo: The Master Chief Collection is a compilation of first-person shooter video games in the Halo series for the Xbox One. The collection includes Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary, Halo 2: Anniversary, Halo 3, and Halo 4, all of which have been remastered for the Xbox One. The collection was released on November 11, 2014.

games.name: Assasin's creed valhalla
games.author: Ubisoft
games.description: Assassin's Creed Valhalla is a 2020 action role-playing video game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft. It is the twelfth major installment and the twenty-second release in the Assassin's Creed series, and a successor to 2018's Assassin's Creed Odyssey. The game was released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, Stadia, and Xbox One on November 10, 2020, and for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X and Series S on December 10, 2020.

games.name: Assasin's creed black flag
games.author: Ubisoft
games.description: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag is a 2013 action-adventure video game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft. It is the sixth major installment in the Assassin's Creed series and a successor to 2012's Assassin's Creed III. The game was released for PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360, Xbox One, and Microsoft Windows in October 2013.

games.name: Grand theft auto 5
games.author: Rockstar Games
games.description: Grand Theft Auto V is a 2013 action-adventure game developed by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games. It is the first main entry in the Grand Theft Auto series since 2008's Grand Theft Auto IV. Set within the fictional state of San Andreas, based on Southern California, the single-player story follows three criminals and their efforts to commit heists while under pressure from a government agency.

games.name: Stardew valley
games.author: ConcernedApe
games.description: Stardew Valley is a 2016 open-ended country-life RPG developed by ConcernedApe and published by Chucklefish. Players assume the role of a character who moves from a big city to a small town in order to start a new life. The game is played from a third-person perspective, and its world is navigated on foot or by riding various forms of transportation.

games.name: Hollow knight
games.author: Team Cherry
games.description: Hollow Knight is a 2017 action-adventure game developed and published by Team Cherry. The game was released for Microsoft Windows, macOS, Linux, PlayStation 4, and Nintendo Switch in 2017, and for Xbox One in 2019. The game is a metroidvania platformer, with exploration and puzzle-solving elements. The player controls a knight who must travel through a vast insectoid kingdom to defeat the Hollow Knight, a being that threatens to destroy the kingdom.

games.name: God of war 4
games.author: Santa Monica Studio
games.description: God of War is a 2018 action-adventure game developed by Santa Monica Studio and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. It is the eighth installment in the God of War series, the eighth chronologically, and the sequel to 2010's God of War III. The game is set in Norse mythology, based on the legends of the eponymous Norse god of war, and chronicles the journey of Kratos, a former Spartan warrior who is tricked into killing his family by his father Zeus, the king of the Greek gods.

games.name: Minecraft
games.author: Mojang
games.description: Minecraft is a sandbox video game developed by Mojang. The game was created by Markus Persson in the Java programming language. It was publicly released for the PC on May 17, 2009, as a developmental alpha version and, after gradual up"date"s, was published as a full release version on November 18, 2011. The game's creative and building aspects have led it to be described as a sandbox game.

games.name: The last of us
games.author: Naughty Dog
games.description: The Last of Us is a 2013 action-adventure game developed by Naughty Dog and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. The game was released for the PlayStation 3 in June 2013, and an remastered version for the PlayStation 4 was released in July 2014. The Last of Us is played from a third-person perspective; players use firearms and improvised weapons, and can use stealth to defend against hostile humans and cannibalistic creatures infected by a mutated strain of the Cordyceps fungus.

games.name: Rainbow six siege
games.author: Ubisoft Montreal
games.description: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege is the sixteenth installment in the Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Franchise developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft Entertainment. It is considered a successor to the cancelled Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Patriots.

games.name: Apex legends
games.author: Respawn Entertainment
games.description: Apex Legends is a free-to-play battle royale game developed by Respawn Entertainment and published by Electronic Arts. It was released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One on February 4, 2019, without any prior announcement or marketing. The game is set in the Titanfall universe, taking place after the events of Titanfall 2 and before the events of Titanfall.
